feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 3:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening then changing to periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the morning. High 10. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
